{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WLR-9100 |revision=(Greyhound) v1 |asin=B019DOBE6M;UK;, |est_release_date=01/05/2016 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |availability=Europe |type=wireless router |pcb_id=7016A0969010 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF1G18AC |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Spansion |fla2_model=S25FL256SAIFR0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP10,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO, Audio out (3.5mm), S/PDIF |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.07-WLR-9100;V1.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.103; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=SitecomXXXXXX |oui=64:D1:A3 |oui_eth=64:D1:A3 }} {{TagLine|AC2600 Greyhound Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.sitecom.com/en/ac2600-greyhound-wi-fi-router/greyhound/p/1715}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Sitecom|pid=greyhoundv1001|pname=wi-fi-router-ac2600}}
*[http://www.greyhoundrouter.com ''Greyhound Router'' on '''Sitecom'''] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sitecom/sitecom_greyhound_v1-001 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] (Techdata) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=61439 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (AP148)
===Reviews=== *[https://tweakers.net/productreview/125745/sitecom-greyhound.html ''Sitecom Greyhound Review'' on '''tweakers.net'''] (in Dutch, [https://ic.tweakimg.net/images/member/original/1AwSC1196WbEjsG.jpeg internal images]) :"7016A0969010", "LPF" and "1533" is silkscreened on the main board.
===See also=== *[[Sitecom WLR-9000]] - ''AC1900 High Coverage Wi-Fi Router'' :Wi-Fi speeds of 600Mbps (2.4GHz) + 1300Mbps (5GHz) :Powerful Dual-Core processor :4x external high-gain antennas with Beamforming :5x Gigabit WAN/LAN ports (1000Mbps) :1x USB 3.0 port and 1x USB 2.0 port *[[Sitecom WLR-9500]] - ''AC2600 High Coverage MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' :Wi-Fi speeds of 800Mbps (2.4GHz) + 1750Mbps (5GHz) :Powerful Dual-Core processor, MU-MIMO :4x external high-gain antennas with Beamforming :5x Gigabit WAN/LAN ports (1000Mbps) :1x USB 3.0 port and 1x USB 2.0 port
